Blog.post: hahaha.. now den update again.. not time & bz recently sia.. todae & ytd nv go sch lolx.. recently everything has settle dwn le.. hai.. wad a dae man.. i go town on weekend lolx.. wif my kor & his frenz dey all.. hahax.. both sat & sun go town.. i saw ah gua on ps dancing para para sia.. while i go there play para para.. hahaha.. dat was in saturday.. den sunday.. i go play pool wif my frenz lolx.. hahaha.. it was fun meh.. h33h33.. but my pool skill still was sux lolx.. hahax.. tml will be beta.. =)

basically todae can sae happy+sad dae for mi lolx.. hai.. realli quite sad.. outside happy.. inside sad.. no one will noe lolx.. happy is.. todae can wear tradtional clothes to sch.. & i wear lolx.. hahax.. purple colour de.. got abit zao gen sia.. hahax.. at the waist there.. my frenz luff.. sae i so sexy.. hahax.. quite sad.. mi wear onli.. my close frenz nv wear.. hai.. bt nvm.. todae is quite fun is sch de.. bt my frenz kana spoil my mood.. sae wad i copy 1 my hair style & hair band.. a tupi thgs lolx.. wan qurrel wif mi dis.. i thk is my frenz sae to her de.. mayb she help her tel.. if she wan sae.. sae infront la.. i don thk dat is copy lolx.. if lykdat.. my frenz b4 nv wear hand band or cut short hair de.. dat mean she copy other too la.. no ritex.. everytime copycat liao.. i realli angry.. plus suddenli my frenz sae dono wad thgs.. makes mi cry in sch.. hai.. she sae does shouldnt sae de thgs lolx.. is abt mi & my ex.. thk le feels realli sad.. hai.. don wan sae le.. bt ltr.. i & my frenz hao back le lolx.. hai.. realli a happy+sad day.. hope tml will be beta for mi.. =)

hahax.. ytd afternoon i go cut my hair lolx.. cut short my front hair.. den trim my hair abit lolx.. hahax.. dono nice anot lei.. hai.. bt quite sad cut my hair.. =( den todae ah.. in sch celebration of racial harmony day lolx.. plus tml.. todae is indian dance performance.. & our class realli did a gd job.. we feels proud of nt.. we won 2nd in whole sch of the indian class.. 1st go to sec 4na.. hahax.. realli proud of mine class.. hahax.. bt the prize hor.. is $20 cash lolx.. dey buy dos indian clothes dono oso how much le ah.. hahax.. bt i nv dance.. hai.. too bad.. hahax..

Hi all, sry so long nv update my blog.. realli bz.. hai..todae moring i was sick.. having headache.. my head veli pain.. hai.. nv go sch.. such a lonely mon morning.. dis few dae mani thgs happen to mi lolx.. realli deeply get hurt.. break wif my ex den stead wif a guy i lyk.. bt in the end.. he blur mi lolx.. sae break wif ex.. actualli i find out nv lolx.. all the way be wif mi & his ex.. i was realli anrgy & upset lolx.. hai.. thk he going 2 timber lolx.. he told mi nv.. put i saw his blog lolx.. friendster oso.. sae wad will take care of mi yi ben zi.. in the end.. he luv his gf alot.. den still ask mi wan be his gal anot.. realli wad a guy lolx.. wen i saw his blog.. a saw a sentence of word.. i realli wish not to see.. bt.. hai.. i ask him.. he gv mi such a tupi excuse.. the message is his ex gf ask him write de.. for the gal frenz to see.. bt realli too jia le lolx.. hai.. i shouldnt be wif him & lyk him for the start.. till now.. my heart was broke into piece.. y he nv tel mi the true.. instead of laying mi.. got be wif gf jus sae lolx.. no need cal mi everyday & sae dos word lolx.. wen got gf.. wonder he did dat to other gals too.. my frenz sae was the true.. hai.. :(

its a friday going midnight now le.. my dae for todae is quite fun & alright lolx.. hahax.. err.. cos todae fri mah.. den earlie can go back hme le wor.. hahaha.. in sch, was quite okz lolx.. hv fun in frenz in toilet todae.. hahax.. in maths les, we ran to toilet & comb hair & den nv return till music les den recess.. hahaha.. after recess.. 2 period eng over, den go hme le.. h33h33.. short dae can sae.. den whole afternoon online lolx.. actulli wan mit him de.. bt nv le lolx.. cos im lazy go.. den he lyk angry wor.. den after dat.. i promise mit him tml le.. den afternoon online chat chat & tok on mic wif my neighbour lolx.. hahax.. den i usualli sing on mic de.. i lyk sing.. so paiseh i feel.. h33h33.. den nite lei.. still same.. acc my neighbour to admiratly garden lolx.. go there see dog.. hahax.. den tok mani mani thgs lolx.. ghost story & her grandma story.. den back hme, online le lolx.. hahax.. den check my friendster email so so.. den hear music.. iyoz so tired.. nv take nap todae.. hahax.. a quite fri nite can sae.. =)
The Day Was Boring.. But Yet Still Pretending Happily.. Dono Y Dis Happening.. Yet I wasnt Wish It To Be.. I Was Wondering.. Y Dis Happening.. I feeling So Miserable..
The Nite Were Lonely.. A Beautiful Story Of A Gal Lovely A Boy Deeply.. The Sun Is Setting.. The Moon Is Rising.. A Gal Is Waiting For A BOy.. She Is Missing..

todae arh.. err.. tired wor.. actulli practice indian dance for racial harmony wif frenz de.. miting all frenz in a plc & practice.. bt in the end nv.. cos some nv turn up.. mi & my frenz wait for 45mins sia.. den go le lolx.. mi todae woke up 8.30.. my frenz cal mi hse in morning.. luckly.. if not, i late woke le.. hahax.. den go kopitiam take our breakfast together..den after nv go, mi actulli wan go hme.. cos my frenz wif their stead.. so gd sia.. jealous sia.. mit em in morning.. if i got sure gd bf gd le.. bt my frenz ask mi go alone.. nv left mi alone lolx.. den go 1 my frenz stead hse play lolx.. h33h33.. chat & play com.. so so.. todae afternoon nv nap ah.. jus awhile lay on bed lolx.. Zzz.. yawn.. wan rest earlie ltr.. offline earlie todae..

hmm.. todae arh??? quite gd lolx.. i start used blog todae le.. nv go out.. all the way slp at hme.. be a pig sia.. h33h33.. all my frenz sae i lyk a pig sia.. slp slp slp.. -.-'' even my dear.. cal mi zhu dear dear.. hahax.. anyway.. thanx a person alot.. dat is.. hahax.. helping mi wif blog.. anyway.. take care of health.. don alway skip breakfast wor.. no gd.. tin hua wor.. take care.. =)
h33.. so happi... got some1 help mi upload my blog.. now got music le.. h33.. thanx u alot.. =)
